law.catch_line: Except as provided in § 4-620 of this subtitle, a person may not use or attempt to use a gig, gig i...
law.text: Except as provided in § 4-620 of this subtitle, a person may not use or attempt to use a gig, gig iron, net, seine, fish pot, or other fishing rig. If any person is found in possession of the devices prohibited by this section while catching fish, it is prima facie evidence of a violation of this section.
